solution_line_template: If Matthews has {matthews_cows} cows, Aaron has {aaron_multiplier}*{matthews_cows} = {aaron_cows} cows.
Together, Aaron and Matthews have {aaron_cows}+{matthews_cows} = <<{aaron_cows}+{matthews_cows}={aaron_matthews_total}>>{aaron_matthews_total} cows.

Since Marovich has {marovich_fewer} fewer cows than the combined number of cows that Aaron and Matthews have, Marovich has {aaron_matthews_total}-{marovich_fewer} = <<{aaron_matthews_total}-{marovich_fewer}={marovich_cows}>>{marovich_cows} cows.
